tidbits.title: Rich Biodiversity
tidbits.description: The Central African Republic is home to diverse ecosystems and wildlife, including national parks like Dzanga-Ndoki, known for forest elephants, gorillas, and diverse bird species.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage with diverse ethnic groups, each contributing unique traditions, music, dances, and artisanal crafts.

tidbits.title: Challenges and Resilience
tidbits.description: Despite challenges, including political instability and conflict, the people of CAR show resilience, preserving their culture and striving for stability and progress.
